answer.final_answer:
Based on the API response, there are two documentary films available on the platform. The first one is a comedy series called "Documentary Now!" which spoofs high-profile documentaries such as "Grey Gardens" and "The Thin Blue Line". However, it is currently not available for playing. The second one is a nature and ecology documentary series called "Experience our planet\'s..." which is available for playing starting from September 1st. The documentary is presented by David Attenborough and explores the wonders of the natural world. 

Unfortunately, based on the API response, there are no cinema related people available for guest speaking at this time. However, there may be other resources or platforms that can assist in finding suitable guest speakers. 

For the streaming link for a YouTube video with the ID 'UxxajLWwzqY', here is the link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UxxajLWwzqY. The video is titled "Icona Pop - I Love It (feat. Charli XCX) [OFFICIAL VIDEO]" and has a length of 180 seconds. The video has been viewed 212,841,886 times and is available in various formats and quality levels.

answer.final_answer:
To discover new people in the entertainment industry on Watchmode, you can follow these steps:

1. Log in to your Watchmode account and click on the "People" tab in the top navigation bar.
2. In the left sidebar, select "New People" to filter the list of people by date range.
3. Select "Last Month" to see the people added within the last month.
4. The output will be a list of new people added to Watchmode within the last month.

To retrieve the details of one of the newly added people, you can use the IMDB ID "tt7286456" and look for the corresponding "people" object in the API response. The "people" object contains a list of individuals involved in the production of the movie "Joker", including their ID, category (e.g. actor, director, writer), and job (if applicable). You can select one of the people in the list and retrieve their corresponding details. For example, if you select the person with ID "nm0001618", you will find that they played the character of Arthur Fleck in the movie. Additionally, the API response also includes information about the movie's plot summary, number of votes, and trailer URLs.

The list includes a variety of genres such as Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Romance, and more. The response also includes the TMDB IDs for some of the genres, but not all of them. You can use this information to retrieve information about movies in specific genres. 

To retrieve basic information about a specific cast member, such as Robert Downey Jr., you can use the API response, which provides his profession as an actor, producer, and soundtrack artist, his birth year of 1965, and his notable known for titles such as tt0371746, tt1300854, tt4154796, and tt0988045. The response also includes a detailed biography of Robert Downey Jr.'s upbringing and career, including his early exposure to the performing arts, his struggles with drug abuse, and his eventual comeback in the early 2000s. I hope this information helps you organize your movie trivia night for your family.

Robert and his sister, Allyson Downey, were immersed in film and the performing arts from a very young age, leading Downey Jr. to study at the Stagedoor Manor Performing Arts Training Center in upstate New York, before moving to California with his father following his parents' 1978 divorce. In 1982, he dropped out of Santa Monica High School to pursue acting full time. Downey Sr., himself a drug addict, exposed his son to drugs at a very early age, and Downey Jr. would go on to struggle with abuse for decades.Downey Jr. made his debut as an actor at the age of five in the film Pound (1970), written and directed by his father, Robert Downey Sr.. answer.final_answer:
To explore different genres of movies, you can fetch genre names and IDs using a movie or TV show database API such as IMDb or The Movie Database (TMDb). The API response will provide a list of genre names and IDs for movies. Each entry in the list contains an ID, a name, and a tmdb_id. Some of the genre names include Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Romance, and War. The IDs and tmdb_ids can be used to identify and categorize movies based on their genres.

To retrieve basic information about a specific cast member, you can also use a movie or TV show database API such as IMDb or TMDb. These APIs provide access to a vast collection of information about movies, TV shows, and cast members. You can use the unique identifier of the cast member, such as their IMDb or TMDb ID, to make an API request and retrieve their basic information such as their name, profession, birth and death years, and notable works. answer.final_answer:
Based on the API response, there are two popular nature documentaries available for streaming in the US. The first one is "Progress vs. Sunsets - Re-Formulating the Nature Documentary" which was released in 2017, and its synopsis is about sending funny animal videos into space for aliens to discover the Earth's ecosystem. The second one is "Solitude: A Nature Documentary" which was released in 2016, and it is about life, discovery, and the incredible beauty of nature. Unfortunately, there is no image available for the second one.

As for the streaming sources for the documentary 'Planet Earth', I'm sorry, but based on the response from the API tool, I could not find any information about streaming sources for this documentary. It seems that the endpoints for searching titles and ultra do not exist. However, I can suggest trying other streaming platforms or using a search engine to find available sources for streaming this documentary.

answer.final_answer:
Yes, we can fetch a listing of all TV networks available for a given title using the Watchmode API. The API response provides the ID, name, origin country, and TMDB ID for each network. The networks listed are from various countries, including the US, UK, Australia, Japan, and Germany. These networks include HBO, National Geographic, YouTube, SBS, DC Universe, and many others.

Additionally, we can provide you with the basic details and streaming availability of a random title. The title of the movie is "Enemy Lines" and it was released in 2020. It is a war movie with a runtime of 92 minutes and has an IMDb rating of 4.5. The movie is available in different languages including English, Polish, Russian, and German. The streaming availability of the movie is provided for the United States and includes platforms like iTunes, Google Play, Vudu, Amazon, YouTube, Hoopla, Redbox, and DirecTV. The API response also provides an image of the movie poster and a synopsis of the plot.

The movie is rated 8 on IMDb. Although the plot is unknown, it is available for streaming in the United States on multiple platforms like iTunes, Google Play, Vudu, Amazon, Microsoft, YouTube, Redbox, AMC Theatres, DirecTV, and HBO Max. To fetch details of the actors and crew associated with the movie, you can follow the steps provided in the subtask. You can use the IMDb API to search for the movie by its title or IMDb ID and then retrieve information about the cast and crew using the "credits" endpoint. The API response can be parsed to extract the names and roles of the actors and crew members. An example of what the API request might look like is provided in the subtask.

answer.final_answer: Based on the API response, we could not find information about popular action movies available for streaming in the US. However, we can suggest searching for popular action movies on different streaming services listed in the response. Some of the popular streaming platforms listed in the response include Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, Disney+, AppleTV+, Hayu, Paramount+, Showtime, Crave, Peacock, and Amazon Freevee. You may need to search for the suggested action movies on these different platforms to find the streaming sources.

answer.final_answer: Based on the API response, there are no endpoints available for finding popular movies available for streaming in Australia or providing streaming sources for recommended movies. However, as an assistant, I can suggest alternative ways to find popular movies available for streaming in Australia. You can check popular streaming platforms like Netflix, Stan, Amazon Prime, or Disney+ to see what movies are available for streaming in Australia. Additionally, you can consult movie review websites or social media platforms to get recommendations on popular movies currently available for streaming in Australia. Once you have found a movie that you wish to watch, you can then check the streaming platforms to see if it is available for streaming. If not, you can search for the movie on Google to see if there are any other streaming sources available.

available_tools.name: autocomplete_search_for_watchmode
available_tools.description: This is the subfunction for tool "watchmode", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Search for titles/and or people by name or a partial name. Useful for building an autocomplete search of titles and/or people. The results include the field result_type to indicate which type of result it is (title or person). For titles, the movie poster "

search_value.description: The phrase to search for, can be a full title or person name, or a partial phrase. For example searching for \"The sha\" will find the movie \"The Shawshank Redemption\".

search_type.description: Set this to 1 to include titles and people in results. Set this to 2 to include titles only. Set this to 3 to include movies only. Set this to 4 to include TV only. Set this to 5 to include people only. By default this is set to 1.

available_tools.name: sources_for_watchmode
available_tools.description: This is the subfunction for tool "watchmode", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Return a listing of all streaming sources that Watchmode supports. Optionally filter by type of source (subscription, free, etc)."

Returns an array of results objects, that can either be a title or a person. Useful for getting the Watchmode IDs for titles and people. For example, you can"

search_field.description:
The field for us to search in, either a 3rd party ID or \\\"name\\\" which will search for a movie/show title or a person's name depending on the type(s) set. Must be one of the following options:
imdb_id, tmdb_person_id, tmdb_movie_id, tmdb_tv_id, name.

search_value.description: The value we should search for. For example, if you set search_field to imdb_id, this would be the IMDB title/person ID, eg. tt0944947.

types.description:
Pass one of the following values, or multiple comma separated values to only return certain types:
tv, movie, person.

answer.final_answer:
For your movie-themed party, here are some popular classic movies that are available for streaming in the US: Casablanca (1942), Gone with the Wind (1939), The Wizard of Oz (1939), Citizen Kane (1941), Singin' in the Rain (1952), It's a Wonderful Life (1946), Psycho (1960), The Godfather (1972), The Sound of Music (1965), and The Maltese Falcon (1941). Please note that availability may vary depending on your location and streaming platform. 

To watch these classic movies, you can use streaming platforms like Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max, Prime Video, Disney+, AppleTV+, Paramount+, Showtime, Crave, Peacock and Peacock Premium, and Amazon Freevee. However, please note that the availability of the movies may vary depending on the streaming platform and your location.

available_tools.name: advanced_search_for_ott_details

region.description: Use 'IN' for India and 'US' for USA , * currently we support only US and Indian region.

available_tools.name: search_for_ott_details
available_tools.description: This is the subfunction for tool "ott_details", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint allows you to search for a movie or tvshow based on the given 'title '."

available_tools.name: genres_for_watchmode
available_tools.description: This is the subfunction for tool "watchmode", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Return a mapping of genre names and IDs. Some genres have a tmdb_id, which is the corresponding genre ID on TheMovieDB.org API."

available_tools.name: title_cast_crew_for_watchmode
available_tools.description: This is the subfunction for tool "watchmode", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Return all people associated with the title, the "cast" (actors), and "crew" (directors, writers, cinematographers, etc). For more details on a person, pass the person-id to the /person/ endpoint."

is_id.description:
This ID can be the Watchmode ID of the title (returned by other endpoints such as the list-titles endpoint), or found in the mapping file: https://api.watchmode.com/datasets/title_id_map.csv.

You can also pass an IMDB ID here instead, or a TMDB type and T

available_tools.name: titles_with_changed_sources_for_watchmode
available_tools.description: This is the subfunction for tool "watchmode", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get a listing of titles that have changed to their streaming sources within the date range."

available_tools.name: search_basic_free_for_streaming_availability
available_tools.description: This is the subfunction for tool "streaming_availability", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Search through the catalog of the given services in the given country. Provides filters such as show language, genre and keyword. Items per page is 8. Output includes all the information about the shows, such as title, IMDb ID, TMDb ID, IMDb rating, link t"

services.description:
A comma separated list of up to 4 services to search in. See `/v2/services` endpoint to get the supported services and their ids/names.

Syntax of the values supplied in the list can be as the followings:

`<sevice_id>`: Searches in the entire catalog of t

country.description: 2 letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the country to search in. See the about page to check the supported countries.

cursor.description: Cursor is used for pagination. After each request, the response includes a `hasMore` boolean field to tell if there are more results that did not fit the returned list size. If it is set as true, to get the rest of the result set, send a new request (with

show_original_language.description: A 2 letter ISO 639-1 language code to only search within the shows whose original language matches with the provided language.

genre.description: A genre id to only search within the shows in that genre. See `/v2/genres` endpoint to see available genres and ids.

keyword.description: A keyword to only search within the shows have that keyword in their overview or title.

output_language.description: 2 letter iso code of the output language. Default is `en`. See the about page to see the list of languages supported.

show_type.description: Type of shows to search in. Accepted values are `movie`, `series` or `all`. The default value is `all`.

available_tools.name: genres_free_for_streaming_availability
available_tools.description: This is the subfunction for tool "streaming_availability", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get the id to name mapping of supported genres."

available_tools.name: search_by_title_free_for_streaming_availability
available_tools.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "streaming_availability", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Search movies and series by title. Maximum amount of items returned are 20, unless there are more than 20 shows with the exact given title input. In that case all the items have 100% match with the title will be returned.

No pagination is supported."

country.description: Regardless of this value, the given title is searched across all the platforms and all the countries. This parameter determines according to which country the streamingInfo field will be populated. Thus even if a show is not available in this country, It w

show_type.description: Type of shows to include in the results. Either `movie`, `series` or `all`. Default is `all`.

output_language.description: 2 letter iso code of the output language. Default is `en`. See the about page to see the list of languages supported.

available_tools.name: Finish
available_tools.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer.final_answer: I am sorry, but the API response states that the rate limit per second for the BASIC plan has been exceeded. Therefore, I cannot provide you with the latest movie releases on Netflix at the moment. However, you can try again later or consider upgrading your plan to access this information. Alternatively, you can check Netflix's official website or social media handles for updates on their latest movie releases. The API response does not provide any information on latest movie releases on Prime Video. I suggest checking the Prime Video platform or a reliable movie website for the latest movie releases. Based on the API response, it seems that the API tool does not have an existing endpoint for fetching the latest movie releases on Hulu. Unfortunately, the tool cannot provide any useful information to answer your question. However, you can try checking Hulu's official website or using a different movie database API tool to get the latest movie releases on Hulu. Regarding cast and crew details for latest movie releases, I can provide you with the cast and crew details for the latest movie releases on Netflix. The response contains a list of crew members associated with various TV shows and movies available on Netflix. The list includes the person's ID, full name, headshot URL, role, episode count, and order. However, since you did not specify which latest movie release you are referring to, I cannot provide you with specific cast and crew details for any particular movie. Unfortunately, there is no information available on the cast and crew details for the latest movie releases on Prime Video and Hulu. I suggest checking the respective platforms or a reliable movie website for such information.

9331.query: I'm planning a family movie night and I need some suggestions for movies to watch. Can you recommend some popular movies from Vimeo? Also, provide me with the download links for these movies so that I can stream them on my TV. Thanks!

answer.final_answer:
Sure, I can help you search for relevant videos for your virtual conference. The API response includes a list of YouTube video results related to virtual conferences. Each video includes information such as the video title, channel name and URL, video length, number of views and whether it is a watch or a short. Some of the titles of the videos in the response include "Virtual Conference Platform by Globibo", "What Makes a Virtual Conference Work?" and "5 tips to ace your next virtual conference presentation."

To download these videos for offline viewing, I recommend using 4K Video Downloader. Here are the steps to download videos using 4K Video Downloader:

1. Download and install 4K Video Downloader from their official website.
2. Open the application and click on the "Paste Link" button.
3. Copy the video link that you want to download from your browser and paste it in the 4K Video Downloader window.
4. Select the video quality and format that you want to download.
5. Choose the download location on your computer and click on the "Download" button.

That's it! Your video will start downloading and you can check the progress in the Downloads tab.

I'm sorry, but the API response you provided does not contain any information related to category info for 'music' on YouTube. The response only includes details such as the video ID, date created, number of likes, dislikes, rating, view count, and a deleted flag. 

To retrieve channel info for 'Spotify' on YouTube using YouTube Data API, you can follow these steps:
1. Obtain an API key from the Google Developers Console.
2. Install the Google API client library for Python.
3. Make a request to the YouTube Data API's search endpoint with the query parameter set to 'Spotify', and the type parameter set to 'channel'.
4. Extract the channel ID from the response and use it to make a request to the channels endpoint to retrieve the channel info.

Here's some sample Python code that demonstrates this process:

```
from googleapiclient.discovery import build

# Replace YOUR_API_KEY with your actual API key
api_key = 'YOUR_API_KEY'
youtube = build('youtube', 'v3', developerKey=api_key)

# Make a request to the search endpoint
search_response = youtube.search().list(
    q='Spotify',
    type='channel',
    part='id',
    maxResults=1
).execute()

# Extract the channel ID from the response
channel_id = search_response['items'][0]['id']['channelId']

# Make a request to the channels endpoint
channels_response = youtube.channels().list(
    id=channel_id,
    part='snippet'
).execute()

# Extract the channel info from the response
channel_info = channels_response['items'][0]['snippet']

# Print the channel info
print(channel_info)
```

This code will print out the channel info for the first search result matching 'Spotify' on YouTube.

Replace "012345" with the actual video ID and "YOUR_API_KEY" with your own API key obtained from Google Cloud Console. This will return a JSON response that includes all the comments for the video in the "snippet" section.

answer.final_answer:
Based on the response, there are two channels that feature short films and documentaries: "Out of Many, One" which is a documentary short film about a diverse group of men and women discussing their personal journeys as they prepare for the U.S. citizenship test, and a documentary film about the life and career of Sophia Loren, an Italian actress. The Sophia Loren documentary is set to be available on January 15, 2021.

To download and stream a specific short film, you can visit a website that hosts short films such as Vimeo or YouTube, and search for the title of the short film that you want to download and stream. If the short film is available for download, look for the download button or link on the website and click on it. If the short film is only available for streaming, click on the play button to start streaming it. You can also use a third-party downloader tool to download the short film from the website. However, it is important to ensure that you have the necessary permissions and rights to download and stream the short film before doing so.

It is possible that these movies are not currently available for streaming on any platform. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and recommend searching for other movies that may be available for your company's team-building event.

answer.final_answer: We cannot fully answer your question as the API endpoint for searching recent sci-fi movies from the past 5 years is not available at the moment. However, we can suggest some popular sci-fi movies from the past 5 years that you might be interested in, such as "Arrival" (2016), "Blade Runner 2049" (2017), "Annihilation" (2018), "Ad Astra" (2019), and "Tenet" (2020). To check if these movies are available for streaming on Netflix and Prime Video, please let us know which movies you want to check. To retrieve IMDb ratings for specific movies, we suggest using the IMDb API and providing the IMDb ID for each movie. Please note that some movies may not have ratings on IMDb. Finally, the API tool provides streaming links for the movie "Enemy Lines" on multiple platforms in the US such as iTunes, Play, Vudu, Amazon, Tubitv, YouTube, Hoopla, Redbox, and Directv, which can be accessed by the user to stream the movie.

This is just a brief overview of the cast and their professions/birth years. Let me know if you need any more information!

answer.final_answer:
Leonardo DiCaprio is an actor, producer, and soundtrack artist born on November 11, 1974, in Los Angeles, California. He started his career with small roles in TV shows and low-budget horror movies and gained popularity in the 1990s for his roles as a teenage heartthrob in movies such as Romeo + Juliet and Titanic. He has acted in several Hollywood blockbusters, made by renowned directors such as Martin Scorsese and Christopher Nolan, and he is now considered one of the biggest movie stars in the world, with a current salary of $20 million a movie. In addition to his acting career, he is also an environmental activist.

answer.final_answer: To create a playlist of your favorite music videos from YouTube, follow the steps provided in Task 1. To enhance your playlist with related tags for the 'Music' category, you can use the YouTube API method called 'videoCategories.list' and specify the 'id' parameter as '10' (which corresponds to the 'Music' category) to retrieve related tags. However, we do not have any information on what API tool was used to retrieve related tags. Regarding information about the 'Music' category, we suggest using the same YouTube API method to retrieve information about the Music category, including related tags. Based on the response from the API tool, it seems that the information provided is related to artists, not the 'Music' category itself.

answer.final_answer:
To download a video from YouTube and include it in your presentation, we need to complete the following tasks:

Task 1: Find the video on YouTube
Unfortunately, we need more information about the video you're searching for. Could you please provide us with the name of the video, or any other details about it that could help us find it on YouTube?

Task 2: Get the download link for the video
Assuming you have found the video you want to download, you can use a YouTube API tool to obtain the download link for the video. The API tool provides the URLs of the available formats along with their details such as width, height, quality, and bitrate. For example, the download link for the video "Icona Pop - I Love It (feat. Charli XCX) [OFFICIAL VIDEO]" with ID "UxxajLWwzqY" is available in multiple formats with different qualities and bitrates. The user can choose the format that suits their needs and use the corresponding URL to download the video.

Task 3: Get the title, length, and description of the video
To get the title, length, and description of the video, you can use a video player library or API in your programming language. Once you have this information, you can output it in whatever format you need, such as printing it to the console or displaying it in a user interface.

Task 4: Find related tags for the 'Education' category
To enhance your presentation, we can help you find related tags for the 'Education' category. Based on the response from the YouTube API tool, the related tags for the 'Education' category are: education, learning, school, motivation, students, love, study, student, science, knowledge, teacher, children, college, india, covid, kids, university, learn, business, teaching, success, instagood, community, teachers, instagram, technology, inspiration, english, and art. You can use these tags to improve the search results and better match your presentation's content.

14947.query: My company is organizing a virtual conference and we would like to feature some videos from Vimeo. Can you help us find videos related to a specific category? It would be great if you could provide the full video information and the related people in the industry. Also, is it possible to download or stream these videos using a specific tool? Thank you!

channel_id.description: The numeric id of the channel or its url name.

per_page.example_value: Number of items to show on each page. Max 50.

available_tools.name: Finish
available_tools.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer.final_answer: Certainly! Using the API response, we can help you find videos related to your specific category. The response contains a list of videos, each with an ID, title, channel name, URL, length, and number of views. Some of the videos are tutorials on how to display posts from a specific category on Wordpress pages, while others are about drone regulations and training or searching for businesses by specific categories. Additionally, the response includes information about related people in the industry. As for downloading or streaming the videos, we do not have information about specific tools for doing so, but you may want to explore the options available with the video hosting platform.

14948.query: I'm interested in exploring the world of filmmaking. Can you recommend some channels on Vimeo that focus on different categories? It would be great if you could provide the full video information and the related people in the industry. Also, is it possible to download or stream these videos using a specific tool? Thank you!

available_tools.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. answer.final_answer:
After researching, we recommend using the YouTube API to search for specific channels related to filmmaking. The API tool provided a list of recommended videos from the Chris Titus Tech YouTube channel. Each video contains information such as video ID, title, author, number of views, video length, description, published time, channel ID, category, type, keywords, and thumbnails. However, the API response does not provide any specific information about people related to the industry, so additional research may be necessary to obtain this information.

Regarding downloading or streaming videos, the API response does not provide any information indicating whether the recommended channel, PewDiePie, allows downloading or streaming of videos. Therefore, it is not possible to suggest a specific tool for this purpose. However, there are various third-party tools available for downloading or streaming YouTube videos, but it is important to note that using these tools may violate YouTube's terms of service. It is recommended to check YouTube's terms of service and the policies of the recommended channel before using any third-party tool for downloading or streaming videos.

answer.final_answer: We apologize, but based on the API responses, we could not find any information that can satisfy your question. The movie database API being searched for does not exist or is currently unavailable, and there are no movies that have changed their streaming sources within the past week. Furthermore, we were unable to retrieve details of new streaming sources for each movie from the API due to exceeding the rate limit per second for our BASIC plan. The country availability API also did not provide any information for your query on checking the availability of each movie in other countries. We suggest checking back later to see if the desired API becomes available or trying to search for other movie databases or country availability APIs that may have this information available. Alternatively, you may want to contact the movie providers directly to inquire about their availability in different countries.

answer.final_answer: I'm sorry, but the API response does not provide any family-friendly TV show with a high IMDb rating. However, as an assistant, I can recommend using other sources to search for family-friendly TV shows with high IMDb ratings. For the streaming availability on Netflix, Disney+, and Apple TV, the API response indicates that the endpoint for checking streaming availability on these platforms does not exist. Therefore, I suggest searching for individual TV shows or movies on each streaming platform separately to check their availability. In terms of retrieving information about the show's cast and crew, the API response provides a comprehensive list of cast and crew members, including their full name, profession, date of birth, place of birth, headshot URL, role, and episode count. The list includes various roles such as Director, Stunt Coordinator, Director of Photography, Producer, Costume Design, and Executive Producer.

answer.final_answer: One popular movie that suits different tastes is "The Shawshank Redemption". It is a classic drama that has a little bit of everything - suspense, humor, and heartwarming moments. The story is about a man who is wrongfully convicted of murder and his experiences in prison. It has a high rating on various movie websites and is considered one of the greatest films of all time. I'm sorry, but the response from the API tool does not provide any useful information about the movie's streaming availability on Netflix, Hulu, or Prime Video. However, you can check the availability of the movie on each platform individually by searching for the movie. The API tool provides information about the movie's cast and crew. Brad Pitt is among the cast members, and the response provides his full name, date of birth, gender, and known works. Additionally, the API tool provides a list of crew members with their full names, headshot URLs, roles, episode counts, and orders. The crew members include directors, producers, cinematographers, associate producers, costume designers, and supervising sound editors.

answer.final_answer: Great! To plan your movie marathon, we can find a series of movies from a specific genre that interests you. However, the API response for checking the streaming availability of movies on Netflix, Hulu, and Prime Video is not available. You can search for the movie titles on each platform individually or use a third-party website or app, such as JustWatch, to check for the availability of the movies across multiple streaming platforms. The API response provides detailed information about the cast and crew of the movies, including their person ID, full name, headshot URL, role, episode count, and order. To provide more specific information about the cast and crew of a particular movie, please let us know which movie you are interested in.

answer.final_answer:
Based on the API response, the famous actor in question is Robert Downey Jr. His filmography details are provided, including his famous roles in movies like "Chaplin", "Short Cuts", "Natural Born Killers", and "Wonder Boys". He also starred in the Fox-TV series "Ally McBeal" and won the Golden Globe Award for his supporting role. However, the API tool did not provide any information on streaming availability of the actor's best-known titles on Netflix, Hulu, and Prime Video. You can check the availability of the titles on these streaming platforms by searching for them individually on each platform. 

In terms of interesting facts about Robert Downey Jr., he was born on April 4, 1965 in Manhattan, New York. He is an actor, producer, and soundtrack artist, with an impressive list of credits to his name. Downey Jr. made his acting debut at the age of five in the film Pound, written and directed by his father. He has struggled with drug abuse for decades, but emerged clean and sober in 2003 to rebuild his career. He won a Golden Globe Award and a Screen Actors Guild Award for his role as attorney "Larry Paul" in the Fox-TV series Ally McBeal. Downey Jr. also released a debut album titled "The Futurist" in 2004.

With an amazing list of credits to his name, he has managed to stay new and fresh even after over four decades in the business.Downey was born April 4, 1965 in Manhattan, New York, the son of writer, director and filmographer Robert Downey Sr. and actress Elsie Downey (née Elsie Ann Ford). Robert's father is of half Lithuanian Jewish, one quarter Hungarian Jewish, and one quarter Irish, descent, while Robert's mother was of English, Scottish, German, and Swiss-German ancestry. Robert and his sister, Allyson Downey, were immersed in film and the performing arts from a very young age, leading Downey Jr. to study at the Stagedoor Manor Performing Arts Training Center in upstate New York, before moving to California with his father following his parents' 1978 divorce. In 1982, he dropped out of Santa Monica High School to pursue acting full time. Downey Sr., himself a drug addict, exposed his son to drugs at a very early age, and Downey Jr. would go on to struggle with abuse for decades.Downey Jr. made his debut as an actor at the age of five in the film Pound (1970), written and directed by his father, Robert Downey Sr.. He built his film repertoire throughout the 1980s and 1990s with roles in Tuff Turf (1985), Weird Science (1985), True Believer (1989), and Wonder Boys (2000) among many others. In 1992, Downey received an Academy Award nomination and won the BAFTA (British Academy Award) for Best Actor for his performance in the title role of Chaplin (1992).In Robert Altman's Short Cuts (1993), he appeared as an aspiring film make-up artist whose best friend commits murder. In Oliver Stone's Natural Born Killers (1994), with Woody Harrelson and Juliette Lewis, Downey starred as a tabloid TV journalist who exploits a murderous couple's killing spree to boost his ratings. For the comedy Heart and Souls (1993), Downey starred as a young man with a special relationship with four ghosts. In 1995, Downey starred in Restoration (1995), with Hugh Grant, Meg Ryan and Ian McKellen, directed by Michael Hoffman. Also that year, he starred in Richard III (1995), in which he appears opposite his Restoration (1995) co-star McKellen.In 1997, Downey was seen in Robert Altman's The Gingerbread Man (1998), alongside Kenneth Branagh, Daryl Hannah and Embeth Davidtz; in One Night Stand (1997), directed by Mike Figgis and starring Wesley Snipes and Nastassja Kinski; and in Hugo Pool (1997), directed by his father, Robert Downey Sr. and starring Sean Penn and Patrick Dempsey. In September of 1999, Downey appeared in Black & White (1999), written and directed by James Toback, along with Ben Stiller, Elijah Wood, Gaby Hoffmann, Brooke Shields and Claudia Schiffer. In January of 1999, he starred with Annette Bening and Aidan Quinn in In Dreams (1999), directed by Neil Jordan.In 2000, Downey co-starred with Michael Douglas and Tobey Maguire in Wonder Boys (2000), directed by Curtis Hanson. In this dramatic comedy, Downey played the role of a bisexual literary agent. In 2001, Downey made his prime-time television debut when he joined the cast of the Fox-TV series Ally McBeal (1997) as attorney "Larry Paul". For this role, he won the Golden Globe Award for Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role in a Series, Mini-Series or Motion Picture Made for Television, as well as the Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Male in a Comedy Series. In addition, Downey was nominated for an Emmy for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series.The actor's drug-related problems escalated from 1996 to 2001, leading to arrests, rehab visits and incarcerations, and he was eventually fired from Ally McBeal (1997). Emerging clean and sober in 2003, Downey Jr. began to rebuild his career.He marked his debut into music with his debut album, titled "The Futurist", on the Sony Classics Label on November 23rd, 2004. The album's eight original songs, that Downey wrote, and his two musical numbers debuting as cover songs revealed his sultry singing voice and his musical talents. Downey displayed his versatility in two different films in October 2003: the musical/drama The Singing Detective (2003), a remake of the BBC hit of the same name, and the thriller Gothika (2003) starring Halle Berry and Penélope Cruz. Downey starred in powerful yet humbling roles inspired by real-life accounts of some of history's most precious kept secrets, including Richard Linklater's A Scanner Darkly (2006) in 2006 co-starring Keanu Reeves, Winona Ryder and Woody Harrelson, and Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus (2006) co-starring Nicole Kidman, a film insp

He has also been nominated for an Academy Award and won a BAFTA for his performance in "Chaplin" (1992). To find the streaming availability of the actor's films on Netflix, Hulu, and Prime Video, you can use JustWatch. Simply go to the JustWatch website, enter the name of the actor in the search bar, and click on the movie or TV show you want to check the streaming availability for. On the movie or TV show page, you will see a list of streaming services such as Netflix, Hulu, and Prime Video that the content is available on. You can click on each streaming service to see if the content is available to watch, and if it is, you can click on the streaming service link to go directly to the content on that platform. As for interesting facts about the actor's personal life, I suggest using a search engine like Google to find relevant information by typing in the actor's name followed by "personal life".

In addition, Downey was nominated for an Emmy for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series.The actor's drug-related problems escalated from 1996 to 2001, leading to arrests, rehab visits and incarcerations, and he was eventually fired from Ally McBeal (1997). Emerging clean and sober in 2003, Downey Jr. began to rebuild his career.He marked his debut into music with his debut album, titled "The Futurist", on the Sony Classics Label on November 23rd, 2004. The album's eight original songs, that Downey wrote, and his two musical numbers debuting as cover songs revealed his sultry singing voice and his musical talents. Downey displayed his versatility in two different films in October 2003: the musical/drama The Singing Detective (2003), a remake of the BBC hit of the same name, and the thriller Gothika (2003) starring Halle Berry and Penélope Cruz. Downey starred in powerful yet humbling roles inspired by real-life accounts of some of history's most precious kept secrets, including Richard Linklater's A Scanner Darkly (2006) in 2006 co-starring Keanu Reeves, Winona Ryder and Woody Harrelson, and Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus (2006) co-starring Nicole Kidman, a film insp

answer.final_answer:
Here are some popular comedy movies that are currently available on streaming platforms in the US: 

1. The Hangover (Netflix)
2. Bridesmaids (Hulu)
3. Superbad (Netflix)
4. The 40-Year-Old Virgin (Netflix)
5. Borat Subsequent Moviefilm (Amazon Prime)
6. Game Night (HBO Max)
7. This Is the End (Netflix)
8. Zombieland (Hulu)
9. Booksmart (Hulu)
10. The Grand Budapest Hotel (Disney+)

Please note that availability may vary depending on your location and subscription plan. Unfortunately, the API tool did not provide any useful information for the runtime and IMDb ratings for these movies found. However, you can search for the specific movie titles on IMDb to find their runtime and ratings.

answer.final_answer: As a movie enthusiast interested in watching critically acclaimed films, we recommend the following award-winning movies with high IMDb ratings: The Godfather (1972), The Shawshank Redemption (1994), The Dark Knight (2008), Schindler's List (1993), Forrest Gump (1994), The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003), The Silence of the Lambs (1991), Saving Private Ryan (1998), Gladiator (2000), and Inception (2010). You can search for these movies on IMDb to find out more information about them. To find the streaming platforms where these movies are available in the US, we suggest using websites like JustWatch or Reelgood. Alternatively, you can search for the movies individually on streaming platforms such as Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, and Disney+.

message.name: Finish

You can also check out streaming platforms like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, and Hulu for more options. The runtime of "Wonder Woman 1984" is 152 minutes, and the runtime of "The Falcon and The Winter Soldier" is around 6 hours (6 episodes x 50-60 minutes). Unfortunately, the response provided by the API tool does not contain information about the IMDb ratings of these movies. However, if you provide me with the names of the movies you are interested in, I can search for their IMDb ratings for you.

answer.final_answer:
Sure! Here are some classic movies with iconic cinematography that you can check out: 

1. The Godfather (1972)
2. Citizen Kane (1941)
3. Lawrence of Arabia (1962)
4. Blade Runner (1982)
5. Gone with the Wind (1939)
6. Casablanca (1942)
7. Psycho (1960)
8. 2001: A Space Odyssey (1968)
9. The Third Man (1949)
10. Sunset Boulevard (1950)

These are just a few examples. There are many other classic movies with great cinematography that you might enjoy. As for availability on streaming platforms in the US, the API tool didn't provide any specific information. However, you can check popular platforms like Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, and Disney+ to see if these movies are available.

answer.final_answer: The name of the cast member with peopleid 'nm0000375' is Robert Downey Jr. He is an actor, producer, and soundtrack artist by profession. He was born in 1965 in Manhattan, New York. Some of his best-known titles are 'Chaplin', 'Iron Man', 'Avengers: Endgame', and 'Sherlock Holmes'. Based on the JustWatch API response, several streaming sources are available in the US and Canada for these titles. Some of the popular streaming services include Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, Disney+, AppleTV+, Hayu, Paramount+, Showtime, Crave, Peacock, and Amazon Freevee. Each streaming service has its own subscription model and availability in different regions. You can check their respective websites or mobile apps to know more about their plans and pricing.

Robert's father is of half Lithuanian Jewish, one quarter Hungarian Jewish, and one quarter Irish, descent, while Robert's mother was of English, Scottish, German, and Swiss-German ancestry. Robert and his sister, Allyson Downey, were immersed in film and the performing arts from a very young age, leading Downey Jr. to study at the Stagedoor Manor Performing Arts Training Center in upstate New York, before moving to California with his father following his parents' 1978 divorce. In 1982, he dropped out of Santa Monica High School to pursue acting full time. Downey Sr., himself a drug addict, exposed his son to drugs at a very early age, and Downey Jr. would go on to struggle with abuse for decades.Downey Jr. made his debut as an actor at the age of five in the film Pound (1970), written and directed by his father, Robert Downey Sr.. He built his film repertoire throughout the 1980s and 1990s with roles in Tuff Turf (1985), Weird Science (1985), True Believer (1989), and Wonder Boys (2000) among many others. In 1992, Downey received an Academy Award nomination and won the BAFTA (British Academy Award) for Best Actor for his performance in the title role of Chaplin (1992).In Robert Altman's Short Cuts (1993), he appeared as an aspiring film make-up artist whose best friend commits murder. For the comedy Heart and Souls (1993), Downey starred as a young man with a special relationship with four ghosts. In 1995, Downey starred in Restoration (1995), with Hugh Grant, Meg Ryan and Ian McKellen, directed by Michael Hoffman. Also that year, he starred in Richard III (1995), in which he appears opposite his Restoration (1995) co-star McKellen.In 1997, Downey was seen in Robert Altman's The Gingerbread Man (1998), alongside Kenneth Branagh, Daryl Hannah and Embeth Davidtz; in One Night Stand (1997), directed by Mike Figgis and starring Wesley Snipes and Nastassja Kinski; and in Hugo Pool (1997), directed by his father, Robert Downey Sr. and starring Sean Penn and Patrick Dempsey. In September of 1999, Downey appeared in Black & White (1999), written and directed by James Toback, along with Ben Stiller, Elijah Wood, Gaby Hoffmann, Brooke Shields and Claudia Schiffer. In January of 1999, he starred with Annette Bening and Aidan Quinn in In Dreams (1999), directed by Neil Jordan.In 2000, Downey co-starred with Michael Douglas and Tobey Maguire in Wonder Boys (2000), directed by Curtis Hanson. In this dramatic comedy, Downey played the role of a bisexual literary agent. In 2001, Downey made his prime-time television debut when he joined the cast of the Fox-TV series Ally McBeal (1997) as attorney "Larry Paul". For this role, he won the Golden Globe Award for Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role in a Series, Mini-Series or Motion Picture Made for Television, as well as the Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Male in a Comedy Series. Emerging clean and sober in 2003, Downey Jr. began to rebuild his career.He marked his debut into music with his debut album, titled "The Futurist", on the Sony Classics Label on November 23rd, 2004. The album's eight original songs, that Downey wrote, and his two musical numbers debuting as cover songs revealed his sultry singing voice and his musical talents. Downey displayed his versatility in two different films in October 2003: the musical/drama The Singing Detective (2003), a remake of the BBC hit of the same name, and the thriller Gothika (2003) starring Halle Berry and Penélope Cruz. answer.final_answer:
Sure, I'd be happy to help you with that! Here are the answers to your questions:

1. List of genres and languages that can be used as filters for movies:
IMDb, Rotten Tomatoes, and JustWatch are popular websites/tools that provide a list of genres and languages that can be used to filter movies. You can visit their websites at www.imdb.com, www.rottentomatoes.com, and www.justwatch.com.

2. List of streaming sources available in the US and Canada for movies:
Netflix, Hulu, Max, Prime Video, Disney+, AppleTV+, Hayu, Paramount+, Showtime, Crave, Peacock, Peacock Premium, and Amazon Freevee are some of the popular streaming sources available in the US and Canada for movies. However, please note that some of these sources are subscription-based and some are free, and some may have limited availability in certain regions.

I hope this helps!

With an amazing list of credits to his name, he has managed to stay new and fresh even after over four decades in the business.Downey was born April 4, 1965 in Manhattan, New York, the son of writer, director and filmographer Robert Downey Sr. and actress Elsie Downey (née Elsie Ann Ford). Robert's father is of half Lithuanian Jewish, one quarter Hungarian Jewish, and one quarter Irish, descent, while Robert's mother was of English, Scottish, German, and Swiss-German ancestry. Robert and his sister, Allyson Downey, were immersed in film and the performing arts from a very young age, leading Downey Jr. to study at the Stagedoor Manor Performing Arts Training Center in upstate New York, before moving to California with his father following his parents' 1978 divorce. In 1982, he dropped out of Santa Monica High School to pursue acting full time. Downey Sr., himself a drug addict, exposed his son to drugs at a very early age, and Downey Jr. would go on to struggle with abuse for decades.Downey Jr. made his debut as an actor at the age of five in the film Pound (1970), written and directed by his father, Robert Downey Sr.. He built his film repertoire throughout the 1980s and 1990s with roles in Tuff Turf (1985), Weird Science (1985), True Believer (1989), and Wonder Boys (2000) among many others. In 1992, Downey received an Academy Award nomination and won the BAFTA (British Academy Award) for Best Actor for his performance in the title role of Chaplin (1992).In Robert Altman's Short Cuts (1993), he appeared as an aspiring film make-up artist whose best friend commits murder. In Oliver Stone's Natural Born Killers (1994), with Woody Harrelson and Juliette Lewis, Downey starred as a tabloid TV journalist who exploits a murderous couple's killing spree to boost his ratings. For the comedy Heart and Souls (1993), Downey starred as a young man with a special relationship with four ghosts. In 1995, Downey starred in Restoration (1995), with Hugh Grant, Meg Ryan and Ian McKellen, directed by Michael Hoffman. Also that year, he starred in Richard III (1995), in which he appears opposite his Restoration (1995) co-star McKellen.In 1997, Downey was seen in Robert Altman's The Gingerbread Man (1998), alongside Kenneth Branagh, Daryl Hannah and Embeth Davidtz; in One Night Stand (1997), directed by Mike Figgis and starring Wesley Snipes and Nastassja Kinski; and in Hugo Pool (1997), directed by his father, Robert Downey Sr. and starring Sean Penn and Patrick Dempsey. In September of 1999, Downey appeared in Black & White (1999), written and directed by James Toback, along with Ben Stiller, Elijah Wood, Gaby Hoffmann, Brooke Shields and Claudia Schiffer. In January of 1999, he starred with Annette Bening and Aidan Quinn in In Dreams (1999), directed by Neil Jordan.In 2000, Downey co-starred with Michael Douglas and Tobey Maguire in Wonder Boys (2000), directed by Curtis Hanson. In this dramatic comedy, Downey played the role of a bisexual literary agent. In 2001, Downey made his prime-time television debut when he joined the cast of the Fox-TV series Ally McBeal (1997) as attorney "Larry Paul". For this role, he won the Golden Globe Award for Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role in a Series, Mini-Series or Motion Picture Made for Television, as well as the Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Male in a Comedy Series. In addition, Downey was nominated for an Emmy for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series.The actor's drug-related problems escalated from 1996 to 2001, leading to arrests, rehab visits and incarcerations, and he was eventually fired from Ally McBeal (1997). Emerging clean and sober in 2003, Downey Jr. began to rebuild his career.He marked his debut into music with his debut album, titled "The Futurist", on the Sony Classics Label on November 23rd, 2004. The album's eight original songs, that Downey wrote, and his two musical numbers debuting as cover songs revealed his sultry singing voice and his musical talents. Downey displayed his versatility in two different films in October 2003: the musical/drama The Singing Detective (2003), a remake of the BBC hit of the same name, and the thriller Gothika (2003) starring Halle Berry and Penélope Cruz. Downey starred in powerful yet humbling roles inspired by real-life accounts of some of history's most precious kept secrets, including Richard Linklater's A Scanner Darkly (2006) in 2006 co-starring Keanu Reeves, Winona Ryder and Woody Harrelson, and Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus (2006) co-starring Nicole Kidman, a film insp

answer.final_answer: For your movie night with friends this weekend, here are some popular movies that were released in the last year that you might enjoy: Parasite, Joker, Avengers: Endgame, Once Upon a Time in Hollywood, The Lion King, Frozen 2, Marriage Story, Knives Out, Little Women, and Jojo Rabbit. However, the API tool did not provide information on the streaming availability of these movies on Netflix, Prime Video, and Hulu. You can try searching for the availability of the movies on each streaming platform individually or use a third-party website or app that tracks the streaming availability of movies across multiple platforms.

answer.final_answer:
For popular songs for a road trip and their streaming availability on Spotify and Apple Music, we recommend searching for "road trip songs" or "driving songs" on Google or any music streaming platform. You can make a list of popular songs that appear on multiple sources or have high streaming numbers and check their availability on both platforms by searching for the song title and artist name. Alternatively, you can use third-party tools or websites such as TuneMyMusic or SongShift to find popular songs and their availability on multiple platforms. 

As for snack suggestions for a road trip, we suggest packing trail mix, granola bars, beef jerky, string cheese, popcorn, fresh fruit such as apples, bananas, and grapes, veggie sticks with hummus, pretzels, peanut butter with crackers, and energy bars. These snacks are easy to pack, don't require refrigeration, and provide a good balance of protein, carbs, and healthy fats to keep you fueled up during the journey. Enjoy your road trip!

answer.final_answer:
For the first question, the API response does not provide any useful information related to the user's query. However, we suggest that the user search for hiking-related podcasts on Spotify and Apple Podcasts using their search functions. They may find a variety of options that can help to motivate and inspire them during their hiking trip.
